caption.p: A-E: Effect of T. bellirica fruit extracts (aqueous and ethyl acetate) and ellagic acid on the serum enzyme markers of liver function (A) Serum glutamic-oxaloacetic transaminase (SGOT), (B) Serum glutamic pyruvic transaminase (SGPT), (C) Alkaline phosphatase (ALP), (D) Lactate dehydrogenase (LDH), (E) γ-glutamyl transferase (GGT) in diclofenac treated rats. Group-I: control rats; Group-II: DCF treated rats; Group-III: DCF + SLM treated rats; Group-IV: DCF + EA treated rats; Group-V: DCF + AQ treated rats; Group-VI: DCF + Eth treated rats. Values represent mean ± SD (n = 5). Abbreviations: DCF- diclofenac, SLM- silymarin, EA- ellagic acid, AQ- aqueous extract, Eth- ethyl acetate extract. (*) represents a significant difference from control (p < 0.0001). (#) represents significant difference from group II (a- p < 0.0005, b- p < 0.005).
